statements: SELECT * FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT product_id, production_date, passed_inspection FROM QualityControlData WHERE passed_inspection = TRUE;
SELECT inspector_name FROM QualityControlData WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Company';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlData WHERE production_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer, production_date, inspector_name, passed_inspection FROM QualityControlData WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY production_date DESC, product_id ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, inspector_name FROM QualityControlData WHERE passed_inspection = TRUE ORDER BY inspector_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM QualityControlData WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_id, manufacturer FROM QualityControlData WHERE passed_inspection = FALSE ORDER BY product_id DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, manufacturer FROM QualityControlData GROUP BY manufacturer ORDER BY total_products DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_category FROM Products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, quality_score FROM Products ORDER BY quality_score DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturing_date FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY manufacturing_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, quality_score, product_category FROM Products WHERE quality_score < 4.5;
SELECT * FROM Products WHERE product_category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, product_category, manufacturing_date FROM Products WHERE quality_score > 4.0 ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, quality_score, manufacturing_date FROM Products WHERE manufacturing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT QC.inspector_name, P.product_name, QC.check_date FROM QualityChecks AS QC JOIN Products AS P ON QC.product_id = P.product_id WHERE QC.check_passed = TRUE ORDER BY QC.check_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM Products GROUP BY product_category HAVING COUNT(*) > 2 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityControlData;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM QualityControlData WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT standard_name, compliance_status FROM IndustryStandards ORDER BY compliance_status DESC, standard_name ASC;
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations WHERE enforcement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM QualityControlData WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM QualityControlData WHERE inspection_result = 'Pass';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM QualityControlData WHERE production_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT standard_name, minimum_requirement FROM IndustryStandards WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant';
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations ORDER BY enforcement_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date, inspection_result FROM QualityControlData WHERE inspection_result = 'Fail' ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, manufacturing_date FROM products ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM products WHERE expiry_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT inspector_name, inspector_email, supervisor_id FROM inspectors WHERE supervisor_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT standard_name, description FROM standards WHERE last_update > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_id, product_name, expiry_date FROM products WHERE manufacturing_date > '2021-01-01';

SELECT qc.check_id, qc.check_result, p.product_name, i.inspector_name FROM quality_checks qc INNER JOIN products p ON qc.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN inspectors i ON qc.inspector_id = i.inspector_id WHERE qc.check_date > '2022-01-01' AND qc.check_result = 'Pass';
SELECT p.product_name, qc.check_result FROM products p LEFT JOIN quality_checks qc ON p.product_id = qc.product_id WHERE qc.check_result = 'Fail';
SELECT i.inspector_name, s.standard_name FROM inspectors i JOIN standards s ON i.supervisor_id = s.standard_id;
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Products WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company';
SELECT product_id, manufacturer, production_date FROM Products WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT check_type, check_date, result FROM QC_Checks WHERE product_id=1 AND result='Failed';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees JOIN Departments ON Employees.department = Departments.department_name;
SELECT * FROM Products ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM Products WHERE manufacturer='Apple' ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_checks FROM QC_Checks GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_checks > 3;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT regulation_name, description FROM Regulations WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%safety%';
